desc: Prosoria is the first once-daily, 3 step psoriasis treatment system. Our psoriasis treatment system includes cream, moisturizer and skin exfoliating ointment. It has been clinically proven to relieve psoriasis symptoms, including scaling, itching and redness. Order now!
